about_the_game:
Molytropia: Dead Stars Still Shine Here - the second chapter of the story tells about the events that took place on a winter evening in a small town. A boy meets an unusual girl on the train on his way home. After a little talk, they decide to go look at the stars. But how does this relate to the first chapter and what happened to the previous characters? The answers will create even more questions.

Features:

• Pleasant atmosphere.

• Hopeless atmosphere.

Before reading, check out the first free chapter - Molytropia: Cloud in Shape of Hurt.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence or gore.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

name: Molytropia: Dead Stars Still Shine Here

short_description: One winter evening a boy meets a girl on the train. Over a short conversation they decide to go and look at the stars. What's waiting for us? The beginning of a new story or a continuation of an old one? This is the second chapter of Molytropia.
